title: Death Note Episodes 1 - 36 (w/English Subtitles)
description:
Well I collected all of the Japanese episodes and put them all together, not sure if there is a collection out on the Pirate Bay with all 36 of them. Most of the episodes are pretty good quality but there are a few that aren\\\\\\\&#039;t the best. Still its a great anime series and can be at times really deep. 

Basically this Japanese high school student, Light Yagamai, finds this small notebook , with it he finds that he can take a human lives away. For the rest, you have to watch the show!

Please enjoy this, I will probably be seeding for some time. If, however, you need more seeders please let me know.
Also I won\\\\\\\&#039;t respond to stupid things like \\\\\\\" SEEEEEEEEEEEED \\\\\\\". Be intelligent in your questions.

Also the music is really good!
